original_definition: 'mandatory if available' means a category of information that Member States have to submit only if such information is available to them at the time of the submission of the biennial progress report.
generated_definition: 'mandatory if available' means mandatory if available, otherwise voluntary.

Article\u00a01: ‘mandatory if available’ means a category of information that Member States have to submit only if such information is available to them at the time of the submission of the biennial progress report.
Article\u00a020: Notation: X = reporting year; Miav = mandatory if available; V = voluntary.
Notation: X = reporting year; Miap =mandatory if applicable; Miav =mandatory if available.
